content:
From: "Luckhardt, Daniel" <daniel.luckhardt@mathematik.uni-goettingen.de>
Dear all,

I am looking for a partner to teach a 17 day course to talented German high school students (aged around 17). The course will be set in the framework of summer camps called "Deutsche Sch√ºlerAkademie" that have become quite an established institution in Germany over the last decades. I am myself participated as a student.

I am open with regard to further development of the course. Unfortunately, one has to apply asap for a course in 2021 or wait for next year.

Let's start with the good aspects:

  • students are highly motivated.

  • travel expenses are covered (you get some honorarium as well, iirc, but it's not in relation to the time you invest).

So now let's come to the bad part/requirements:

  • You should be female (they prefer mixed teams, and I am male)

  • You must have a good command of German

  • be ready to invest quite some time. This includes a preliminary meeting in spring (that will be online in 2021 due to Corona).

  • the summer camp is exhausting due to the high motivation of the students (the course is 6 hours/day but you are in contact with the students for the whole day)

If you feel ready for this challenge, please contact me asap.

Yours,

Daniel Luckhardt
